mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_test_result(test_result_no, test_result_user, test_result_code, test_result, test_result_runingTime, test_result_useMemory, test_result_runingTime, test_result_count, test_result_error) VALUE(#{result_no}, #{result_user}, #{reslult_code}, #{result}, #{result_time}, #{result_userMemory}, #{result_runingTime}, #{reslut_count}, #{result_error})
